Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.name: fileExists(filePath:)
Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.abstract: Tests if a file or directory exists at a given path

Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.name: mkdir(path:)
Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.abstract: Creates a directory (and any needed intermediates) at a path.

Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.name: path(path:relativeTo:)
Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.abstract: Calculates the replative path from a base path to a traget path.

Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.name: runShellCommand(command:)
Functions.html#/s:24IDZSwiftScriptingGoo.abstract: Runs a shell command, capturing the exit status, standard output and standard error.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS24IDZSwiftSc.name: split(c:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS24IDZSwiftSc.abstract: Splits a string into components delimited by a spcific character
